n: Green Tomato and Bell Pepper Delight
des: "Delicious, fresh and tasty! Serve as a side dish or top it on a  baked potato or some rice."
ins: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  Stir in green tomatoes, bell pepper, celery, green onions and apple cider vinegar.  Saute until tender crisp, about 5 to 10 minutes.
